description: Grabbed second position in a Capture the Flag competition conducted as part of Invente 2024.
Bagged second position in a Capture the Flag competition conducted as part of Saavan'23 by IITM.
Won first prize in a 24-hour hackathon conducted as part of Tech Grad 2024.
Ranked 340 overall in the Amazon ML Challenge competition with an F1 Score of 0.328.
Finalist among 100 teams in the SIH 2023 internal hackathon.
Secured department second rank in the second semester.
